label.text: Click again to bring back normal mode
See the leaderboard for the car below
Sometimes there's a star which is set by us to determine a track to recommend
Your best time for specific car is shown here
Difficulty and quality bars with lower being easier/worse and higher being harder/smoother
Go back to the game without respawning if you didn't do any leaderboard changes. Clicking while no car selected puts you into spectator mode
The leaderboard where you can see times from different zones or download ghosts and drive with them
The player which finished the track first, called Validator
Turn on and off the ghost of your personal best. You can also show ghosts from different cars racing at the same time
